data.name: Kill the King
data.detailed_description:
Kill the King is a cooperative, physics-based, VR sandbox. As a deadly assassin, you must take out the king by sneaking and battling through expansive villages and castles. Physics driven mechanics allow you to pick up anything and use it as a weapon, and traverse the environment by climbing and grappling. With nearly anything and everything at your disposal, the only limitations are your wit and resourcefulness.

Cooperative Gameplay
Play alone or as a team. Queue up with friends or strangers, and battle your way through villages and castles. Adjust your strategies based on your environment and the number of allies on your team.

Physics-based Environment
The physics-based world allows players to creatively interact with their environment. Soft-body physics allows for bow and rope mechanics that feel and behave realistically.

Immersion Inverse Kinematics
With full body IK, players can feel their presence in VR. Precise movement and interaction systems provide users with unparalleled physical interaction with the VR space.

data.short_description: Kill the King is a cooperative, physics-based, VR sandbox. Become a deadly assassin and infiltrate massive castle environments to remove a corrupt king. Use your bow, swords, and anything else you find to reach your goal.
